ModMetaData.name: Balanced Eclipse and Solar Flare
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
Solar flares and Eclipses happen way too much in Rimworld, to the point where they become normalized. Let's change them to be rarer and more impactful.
- Increased the minimum amount of time between occurances for both game effects x4 - Decreased the base chance of both events.
